short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks content and displays ads - it's the opposite of an ad blocker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing content clutter your browser?  Block it! Just show what you really care about - the ads.  This extension preserves the whitespace and layout of a site by making its content transparent, allowing you to focus on the advertisements.
